content: this beanie is knitted in the round starting with the ribbing alternating knit and purl stitches the body is worked in stockinette knit stitches in the round using the fair isle or stranded technique the hat is one size for adult head circumference of about 53/54 cm beanie dimensions 43 cm in circumference 24 cm in height the pattern to knit this beanie includes 5 pages with how to photos and is for intermediary knitters materials - 1 everest roses filati 75% wool - 25% acrylic 100 g / 100 m color 4 blue color a - 1 everest roses filati 75% wool - 25% acrylic 100 g / 100 m color 1 white color b - needles 6 mm circular needles or equivalent for have the gauge 16 stitches for 15 row 10x10 cm - stitch marker - pom pom maker or faux pom pom
